extendedInfo.description: New Year Apps- Make Your New Year Eve More Sizzling and SnazzyAre planning to celebrate this New Year evening in a different way? In such a case, party venue, decoration, gifts, menu, etc. must have received your prior attention, but about sending New Year greetings cards and wishes? It is equally important to wish your loved ones in a distinct way to build a strong bond and rejuvenate your relationship. Lauruss InfoTech has created an amazing New Year app that not only allows you to send beautiful greetings, but also enable you to give it a personal touch. We are all set to make your this New Year celebration unforgettable and add more charm to it. Our New Year special app allow you to send heart-stealing greeting cards to your loved one who are with you, not around you or meet you online. Obviously, you cannot go to everyone you know and wish, thatâs why we have designed an app to facilitate you to send your wishes in a different way that enhance the warmth of your relationship. Our app is easy to download and operate and combines striking features that you will not find elsewhere.What Our New Year Greeting app Offers?You must be taking it as an ordinary app that is used to just send a greeting card. Itâs not like that, instead it is more advanced. Our New Year app has many things to offer, such as;Send New Year Card and Wishes via SMSIf you want to send a personalized greeting card or customized wishes on this New Year, We are here to help you. You just have to hit the icon, select the card or quotation you are willing to send and tap on send button. Nothing could be that easy and comprehensive. Share Your wishes OnlineYou must be having a big list of friends on your different social media accounts. They are also waiting for your warm wishes and invitation to the celebration. You can do it all within few seconds by installing our New Year app onto your iPhone. Send New Year Greetings via EmailIn case, you only have email address of your friend or you want to send greetings to your business circle, Clarus Apps New Year app is the right choice to make. You can mail wonderful New Year cards adored with heart-touching wishes and quotations. We, at Clarus Apps are committed to add more beauty, charm and joy to all your reasons to celebration. Download New Year onto your iPhone and SURPRIZE your beloved ones with amazing New Year greeting cards and quotations.~ New Year Quotes~ New Year Greetings~ Send Greetings~ Newest Quotes~ New Year Cards~ Greeting Cards~ Designed Cards

reviews.title: 2013... God first, family and friends
reviews.comment: This app is what I have been looking for. However, I can send cards out to friends and family. I\'m loving the words and have a choice of cards.
